title: Bigi65
author: Bigi65
content: Hello guys.Does anyone have a crypto address , bitcoin , etheruem , etc ... , no matter which coin , with a regular monthly payments history?I want exactly an invoice payments in crypto ,monthly and constant amount of dollars for last two years.I don't want miner payments samples.Regular payments should be 80$ , 90$ or 100$.It's very vital for me and I will pay money for this.plz dm me.Thank you.

comments.author: bnbstorm
comments.body: Why do you need such address? Also you should look on blockchain for addresses of services like coinpayments or similar and you will find your required addresses.

comments.author: pawel7777
comments.body: I think you're asking for too much. I can't even think of any business that would require regular payments in that specific bracket, that would issue invoices, and that would accept bitcoin or other cryptos directly. If you have any particular services in mind - share them.And any invoice payments would include the name of either a person or a business - so what use would it be to you?

comments.author: Bigi65
comments.body: Quote from: bnbstorm on January 25, 2023, 12:10:42 PMWhy do you need such address? Also you should look on blockchain for addresses of services like coinpayments or similar and you will find your required addresses.Thanks for reply.I will check this.If you found such crypto address I would be grateful to dm me.I will pay for it.

comments.author: Bigi65
comments.body: Quote from: pawel7777 on January 25, 2023, 09:23:57 PMI think you're asking for too much. I can't even think of any business that would require regular payments in that specific bracket, that would issue invoices, and that would accept bitcoin or other cryptos directly. If you have any particular services in mind - share them.And any invoice payments would include the name of either a person or a business - so what use would it be to you?Thanks for reply.For Ex. some of web hosting company accept payments in crypto, so customers pay their invoices regularly.Actually I need exactly something like this.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Most of the people here have Bitcoin addresses that receive payments of about $40 to $300 per week.you can ask anyone if they want to sell their address, but the problem remains that these addresses are often supplied from one address or an address connected to the prospect campaign, so I don't know if that is suitable.If your purpose is to hide your identity, why not use any of the mixing services here is a list of good mixing services (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2827109.0) ? If your purpose is to Tax evasion, you may get into bigger problems.

comments.author: Bigi65
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on January 27, 2023, 09:41:40 AMMost of the people here have Bitcoin addresses that receive payments of about $40 to $300 per week.you can ask anyone if they want to sell their address, but the problem remains that these addresses are often supplied from one address or an address connected to the prospect campaign, so I don't know if that is suitable.If your purpose is to hide your identity, why not use any of the mixing services here is a list of good mixing services (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2827109.0) ? If your purpose is to Tax evasion, you may get into bigger problems.Hello and thanks for reply.No It's not a Tax evasion case, it's just a getting rid of a boss case and I just want something to show them.It's vital to me to keep my job but I doubt this request get others in trouble as you know these addresses are on blockchain and should only be found.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: I think you need this either for tax or you want to ask for credit in the bank, I think there is no such invoice as you want to, but the people who send payments regularly can send the invoice maybe or if the transaction is on bitcoin you can print the transaction receipt that is available on blockchair.com here let me give you an example https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/transaction/0dfb9a3111ac777b33a69748488a8aaf92f74c41345cc317cf63c7f6458dc9fc.pdf

comments.author: Bigi65
comments.body: Quote from: dansus021 on January 28, 2023, 05:28:28 AMI think you need this either for tax or you want to ask for credit in the bank, I think there is no such invoice as you want to, but the people who send payments regularly can send the invoice maybe or if the transaction is on bitcoin you can print the transaction receipt that is available on blockchair.com here let me give you an example https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/transaction/0dfb9a3111ac777b33a69748488a8aaf92f74c41345cc317cf63c7f6458dc9fc.pdfThanks for your suggestion and I would be happy to buy this address if anyone has it.

comments.author: rolandcxr
comments.body: i can help you , but my constant monthly income was around 5k

comments.author: theraw
comments.body: Quote from: bnbstorm on January 25, 2023, 12:10:42 PMWhy do you need such address? Also you should look on blockchain for addresses of services like coinpayments or similar and you will find your required addresses.why? need to make dat scam look as legit as possible
